step4.title: Why you forget...
step4.subtitle: ... and how to avoid it!
step4.explanation: After a few days, your brain forgets most of what you learn, if you don't review.
step4.forgettingCurve: This is what we call **the forgetting curve**.
step4.solution: Fortunately, there's a simple solution: **review at the right time**.
step4.spacedRepetition: This is the principle of **spaced repetition**, used in this app.

step5.title: It's proven
step5.text1: Our algorithm is based on spaced repetition, a method up to
step5.text2: more effective than traditional learning for long-term memorization.
step5.studyCaption: Study "Repeat before Forgetting", Harvard Medical School, 2017
